name: Journey to the space core version 0.0.2 [Demo]
name_original: Journey to the space core version 0.0.2 [Demo]
description:
While on patrol  near the space core you encounter an infection starting you journey through the cosmos to protect the space core from being taken by the infectious disease.

game was highly inspired by Nova Drift by Chimeric.

Warning this game is still being worked on and will experience frequent update kinda like a rough sketch right now but the game is being posted for feed back purposes only.

Next update will be new enemy's and area (and polish).
